title: 820-2641-the accelerated cooler
message: Hello my friend, I have this iMac that by turning on the cooler already accelerates, I have analyzed the sensors, installed the HWMonitor and only the PCH has a higher temperature of 50 degrees Celsius. I don't know what to do, could you help me?

title: 820-2641-the accelerated cooler
message: HDD and LCD temperature sensors connected for sure?

title: 820-2641-the accelerated cooler
message: are connected for sure, we use another one to check, but I'm still on the accelerated cooler.

title: 820-2641-the accelerated cooler
message: Fan starts at max speed, or increases in time?

title: 820-2641-the accelerated cooler
message: after 30 seconds the cooler is at maximum speed.

title: 820-2641-the accelerated cooler
message:
Try disconnecting camera, J4700.
Run ASD EFI and see if any error pops up.

 we use another one to check"
Another what?
Board, LCD, HDD?

title: 820-2641-the accelerated cooler
message: use another LCD and another HDD from another iMac.

title: 820-2641-the accelerated cooler
message:
Did you check if the LCD temp sensor is attached to the screen?
Run corresponding ASD and report...
